body_html:
Guna,

I am trying to compile bazel-0.7.0-dist.zip on rel6, the bazel is not compaile:
Here is the step
################
scl enable devtoolset-4 bash

cat >/tmp/bazelrc <<EOF
startup --batch
build --spawn_strategy=standalone --genrule_strategy=standalone
EOF

Which gcc
/opt/rh/devtoolset-4/root/usr/bin/gcc

[dsapadmn@vcld002370 bazel-0.7.0]$ BAZELRC=/tmp/bazelrc ./compile.sh
ðŸ�ƒ Building Bazel from scratch
################
and the bazel is not compile, could you please provide a tools/cpp/CROSSTOOL to correct gcc (/opt/rh/devtoolset-4/root/usr/bin/gcc) so that I can compile bazel?

Thanks
Lucy

body:
Guna, 

I am trying to compile bazel-0.7.0-dist.zip on rel6, the bazel is not compaile:
Here is the step
################
 scl enable devtoolset-4 bash

cat >/tmp/bazelrc <<EOF
startup --batch
build --spawn_strategy=standalone --genrule_strategy=standalone
EOF

Which gcc
/opt/rh/devtoolset-4/root/usr/bin/gcc


[dsapadmn@vcld002370 bazel-0.7.0]$ BAZELRC=/tmp/bazelrc ./compile.sh
ðŸƒ  Building Bazel from scratch
################
and the bazel is not compile, could you please provide a tools/cpp/CROSSTOOL to correct gcc (/opt/rh/devtoolset-4/root/usr/bin/gcc) so that I can compile bazel?

Thanks
